body.p: Funeral Cost Funeral service here includes every assistance toward minimizing expense; at the same time following modern day style and high style and high quality in every detail. Thus the very utmost possible is obtained, at a cost that is the very lowest possible. Cooperating in that way, a service is given which ideally satisfies in every way: character of funeral and cost, and the family comfort resulting. Walter R. Ninneman Phone 310 Tomah, Wis.
